TopicTitle: Why is there no EVA view for the Mk. 2 cockpit?

Articles.Content: Why isnt there an EVA view for it? Is it in the planned features? Or is it intentional. I dont see why the pod would have windows if you arent going to let us see out of them!
Thats simply unimplemented, in fact, the cockpit itself is just a placeholder for future updates.

Yes, as shoveycat said it's simply not implemented yet. You may be able to edit the .cfg and make it refer to the MkI cockpit's interior, if you don't mind it being the same. Not sure if it'd line up correctly though, but something to try. I imagine a full, complete IVA is planned, though of course I can never speak with 100% certainty, as there are many things in development that are tentative.
Why does this thread come up so often? And why does everyone always forget that that there's a download available for this when it does?
And adding that Mk2 cockpit, or the Mk3 from TouhouTorpedo will not make your craft or saves unshareable, so even stock players can use it

Where can I find the MK3 from TouhouTorpedo?

I search it on the forum but haven't found it.
Go to Spaceport - search "cockpit". The first two hits are this one and the Mk3.
